pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Gzip Utilities for Python[![Build Status](https://dev.azure.com/eossu/public/_apis/build/status/Eossu.gzip-utils?branchName=master)](https://dev.azure.com/eossu/public/_build/latest?definitionId=2&branchName=master)This is a repository to hold diffrent utilities for gzip.## Utilities- [Compressed JSON List](docs/utils/compressed_json_list.md)
